name: Omegle Dark Plus
description:
A clean, smooth, and easy on the eyes dark theme for Omegle, with many quality of life features to improve your conversations with strangers.

Features:
  • Supports all browsers.
  • Smooth dark theme.
  • Uncluttered interface, with lots of useless distractions removed.
  • Uniform chat log using Y: for You and S: for Stranger.
  • Chat text is color cordinated for clarity.
  • Options to customize Omegle just for you.

Options:

user.name: CheatFreak47
user.about: I make userstyles that usually make sites easier to use or make them easier on the eyes.
